metadata.title: CVE-2020-22283 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in theicmp6_send_response_with_addrs_and_netif() function of Free SoftwareFoundation lwIP version git head allows attackers to access sensitiveinformation via a crafted ICMPv6 packet.

criterions.comment: lwip package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
